Lilu & Plugins.Name: Lilu
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Arbitrary kext and process patching on macOS.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: AirportBrcmFixup
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Various patches for Broadcom Airport Wi-Fi cards.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: AppleALC
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Native macOS HD audio for not officially supported codecs.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: AppleBacklightFixup
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Workarounds Clover limitation to patch AppleBacklight.kext in OS Installer and Recovery, original repository by hieplpvip.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: ATH9KFixup
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Various patches for unsupported Atheros Wi-Fi cards, original repository by chunnann.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: HibernationFixup
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Enable 3 & 25 mode hibernation on certain hardware.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: NightShiftUnlocker
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Enables Night Shift on all the models.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: NoTouchID
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Disables Touch ID checks causing hangs.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: NoVPAJpeg
Lilu & Plugins.Description: Workarounds Quicklook issues on 10.14 when using macmodels with IGPU on CPUs without IGPU. Can be used as an alternative to MacPro6,1 model.

Lilu & Plugins.Name: AsusSMC
Lilu & Plugins.Description: A VirtualSMC plugin provides native support for ALS, keyboard backlight and Fn keys for Asus laptops on macOS.

Others.Name: ACPIBatteryManager
Others.Description: Implements an Advanced Configuration and Power Interface (ACPI) based battery manager kernel extension (kext/driver) for non-Apple laptops running OS X.

Others.Name: ACPIDebug
Others.Description: This kext allows one to easily trace variables and execution path from DSDT (or SSDT) code.

Others.Name: BrcmPatchRAM
Others.Description: BrcmPatchRAM kext is an OS X driver which applies PatchRAM updates for Broadcom RAMUSB based devices.

Others.Name: CodecCommander
Others.Description: Used for updating EAPD (External Amplifier) state on HDA (High Definition Audio) codecs that use given amp on Speaker or Headphone nodes (both, or even extra ones in some cases).

Others.Name: EFICheckDisabler
Others.Description: Disable the EFICheck during the booting stage.

Others.Name: FakePCIID
Others.Description: The purpose of this kext is to attach to any IOPCIDevice so it can provide alternate PCI ID when another driver attached to the same device requests them.

Others.Name: FakeSMC
Others.Description: An open source SMC device driver/emulator developed by netkas.

Others.Name: IntelMausiEthernet
Others.Description: OS X driver for Intel onboard LAN.

Others.Name: NullEthernet
Others.Description: The purpose of this driver is to enable Mac App Store access even if you donâ€™t have a built-in Ethernet port with supporting drivers.

Others.Name: Realtek RTL8111
Others.Description: OS X open source driver for the Realtek RTL8111/8168 family.

Others.Name: SATA-unsupported
Others.Description: Allow the Apple provided kexts to recognize certain SATA controllers properly.

Others.Name: USBInjectAll
Others.Description: This kext attempts to inject all ports for each controller, and for hubs as well.

Others.Name: VoodooPS2Controller
Others.Description: Contains updated Voodoo PS/2 Controller, improved Keyboard & Synaptics TouchPad.

Others.Name: VoodooI2C
Others.Description: VoodooI2C is a project consisting of macOS kernel extensions that add support for I2C bus devices.

Others.Name: XHCI-unsupported
Others.Description: Certain Intel xHCI controllers are not supported natively and require an injector. For these systems, install XHCI-unsupported.kext.
